aiPluginUtterances.utterance: Can you search the database to find most applicable Candidates for this job

GenAiPlugin.description: Find potential matching candidates in the database after a job spec is created.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: Present the most applicable candidates to the user that is provided by the Prompt

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to find the most applicable candidates based on the job spec and assist in creating an application and setting up a reminder to call the candidate.
